texts: Parental Leave Policy: Employees are entitled to 12 weeks of parental leave after the birth or adoption of a child, contingent on 12 months of continuous employment.
Sick Leave Policy: Employees earn 1 day of sick leave each month, capped at 12 days annually, with a medical certificate needed for absences over 3 days.
Voluntary Resignation Notice: Employees are required to give a minimum of 30 days notice before resigning voluntarily.
Remote Work Policy: Employees may work remotely up to 2 days per week with prior approval from their manager.
